name: Valet Out of Space.
description:
You play the role of a valet. Your job is to park and retrieve space ships.

They arrive, you park them. They want them back, you get them. That is it.

You carefully park spaceships so you don't run out of space. This might be a bit lost as you frantically park and retrieve ships.

You get paid based on how many ships you process. You lose money if spaceships are damaged or the client is waiting too long. If you run out of money, you lose.

There are inspirational quotes to inspire you.

You can also move ships around by blasting them.
